item.title: First Post
item.author: Smit
item.description: This is my first post. I have finally decided and gathered the courage to write. I always wanted to write but dint had that inspiration but recently I got so much inspired from skilled writers like Chip Huyen, Eugene Yan ,Vincent Warmerdam, Lilian Weng, Daniel Seita, Laszlo Sragner, Jay Alammar and Sebastian Ruder to name a few and many more, that I wanted to start writing on my own. Let’s see how it goes.
